tool_description: Initializes and manages chat sessions, tracking customer context and session metadata throughout the conversation lifecycle.

session_type.description: Type of session: new, continuation, callback

error_messages: Invalid channel: Use one of [web, mobile, social, email]
Invalid session type: Use one of [new, continuation, callback]
Session limit exceeded: Maximum concurrent sessions reached for this customer
usage: Provide the channel and optionally customer_id and session_type. Creates a new chat session and returns session details for tracking.

session_id.description: Unique identifier for this chat session
